item.title: Hungry Elephant Raids Grocery Store In Thailand For Snacks
item.description: The pachyderm ate about nine bags of sweet rice crackers, a sandwich and some dried bananas.

item.title: Pregnant News Anchor Stays On Air Even After Her Water Breaks
item.description: CBS6 Albany's Olivia Jaquith told viewers, “I’ll stay on the desk for as long as I possibly can, but if I disappear, that’s what’s going on.”
